name: Hive Mine
description:
Play as Quin in her mission to find where her company's supply of copper is going on the moon of Vorla. Shoot, jump, explore and fight against the Hive to recover the company's lost assets. 

Changes to game

-Pistol colors have been changed to copper and green.

-A unique second maze level added.

-Enemy spawners glow green in the dark.

-Character light added for space suit light effect in darkness.

-Darkness added to 2 out of the three levels of the game.

-Copper ore added to the game to reflect name of game and asset search for character for end game.
